00038 const uint32_t CellCache::ALLOC_BIT_MASK  = 0x80000000;
00039 const uint32_t CellCache::OFFSET_BIT_MASK = 0x7FFFFFFF;
00040 
00041 
00042 //#define STAT

00044 
00045 CellCache::~CellCache() {
00046   uint64_t mem_freed = 0;
00047   uint32_t offset;
00048   uint8_t *ptr;
00049 #ifdef STAT
00050   uint32_t skipped = 0;
00051 #endif
00052 
00053   for (CellMap::iterator iter = m_cell_map.begin(); iter != m_cell_map.end(); iter++) {
00054     if (((*iter).second & ALLOC_BIT_MASK) == 0) {
00055       ptr = (uint8_t *)(*iter).first.ptr;
00056       offset = (*iter).second & OFFSET_BIT_MASK;
00057       mem_freed += offset + ByteString(ptr + offset).length();
00058       delete [] ptr;
00059     }
00060 #ifdef STAT
00061     else
00062       skipped++;
00063 #endif
00064   }
00065 
00066 #ifdef STAT
00067   cout << flush;
00068   cout << "STAT[~CellCache]\tmemory freed\t" << mem_freed << endl;
00069   cout << "STAT[~CellCache]\tentries skipped\t" << skipped << endl;
00070   cout << "STAT[~CellCache]\tentries total\t" << m_cell_map.size() << endl;
00071 #endif
00072 
00073   Global::memory_tracker.remove_memory(mem_freed);
00074   Global::memory_tracker.remove_items(m_cell_map.size());
00075 
00076 }

00082 int CellCache::add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, int64_t real_timestamp) {
00083   ByteString new_key;
00084   uint8_t *ptr;
00085   size_t key_len = key.length();
00086   size_t total_len = key_len + value.length();
00087 
00088   (void)real_timestamp;
00089 
00090   new_key.ptr = ptr = new uint8_t [total_len];
00091 
00092   memcpy(ptr, key.ptr, key_len);
00093   ptr += key_len;
00094 
00095   value.write(ptr);
00096 
00097   if (! m_cell_map.insert(CellMap::value_type(new_key, key_len)).second) {
00098     m_collisions++;
00099     HT_WARNF("Collision detected key insert (row = %s)", new_key.str());
00100     delete [] new_key.ptr;
00101   }
00102   else {
00103     m_memory_used += total_len;
00104     if (key.ptr[key_len - 9] <= FLAG_DELETE_CELL)
00105       m_deletes++;
00106   }
00107 
00108   return 0;
00109 }

00120 void CellCache::get_split_rows(std::vector<std::string> &split_rows) {
00121   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00122   if (m_cell_map.size() > 2) {
00123     CellMap::const_iterator iter = m_cell_map.begin();
00124     size_t i=0, mid = m_cell_map.size() / 2;
00125     for (i=0; i<mid; i++)
00126       iter++;
00127     split_rows.push_back((*iter).first.str());
00128   }
00129 }

00131 
00132 
00133 void CellCache::get_rows(std::vector<std::string> &rows) {
00134   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00135   const char *row, *last_row = "";
00136   for (CellMap::const_iterator iter = m_cell_map.begin(); iter != m_cell_map.end(); iter++) {
00137     row = (*iter).first.str();
00138     if (strcmp(row, last_row)) {
00139       rows.push_back(row);
00140       last_row = row;
00141     }
00142   }
00143 }

00149   return new CellCacheScanner(cellcache, scan_ctx);

00157 CellCache *CellCache::slice_copy(int64_t timestamp) {
00158   Key key;
00159 #ifdef STAT
00160   uint64_t dropped = 0;
00161 #endif
00162 
00163   CellCachePtr child_ptr = new CellCache();
00164 
00165   for (CellMap::iterator iter = m_cell_map.begin(); iter != m_cell_map.end(); iter++) {
00166 
00167     if (!key.load((*iter).first)) {
00168       HT_ERROR("Problem deserializing key/value pair");
00169       continue;
00170     }
00171 
00172     if (key.timestamp > timestamp) {
00173       child_ptr->m_cell_map.insert(CellMap::value_type((*iter).first, (*iter).second));
00174       (*iter).second |= ALLOC_BIT_MASK;  // mark this entry in the "old" map so it doesn't get deleted
00175     }
00176 #ifdef STAT
00177     else
00178       dropped++;
00179 #endif
00180   }
00181 
00182 #ifdef STAT
00183   cout << flush;
00184   cout << "STAT[slice_copy]\tdropped\t" << dropped << endl;
00185 #endif
00186 
00187   Global::memory_tracker.add_items(child_ptr->m_cell_map.size());
00188 
00189   m_children.push_back(child_ptr);
00190 
00191   return child_ptr.get();
00192 }

00198 CellCache *CellCache::purge_deletes() {
00199   Key key_comps;
00200   size_t len;
00201   bool          delete_present = false;
00202   DynamicBuffer deleted_row(0);
00203   int64_t       deleted_row_timestamp = 0;
00204   DynamicBuffer deleted_column_family(0);
00205   int64_t       deleted_column_family_timestamp = 0;
00206   DynamicBuffer deleted_cell(0);
00207   int64_t       deleted_cell_timestamp = 0;
00208   CellMap::iterator iter;
00209 
00210   HT_INFO("Purging deletes from CellCache");
00211 
00212   CellCachePtr child_ptr = new CellCache();
00213 
00214   iter = m_cell_map.begin();
00215 
00216   while (iter != m_cell_map.end()) {
00217 
00218     if (!key_comps.load((*iter).first)) {
00219       HT_ERROR("Problem deserializing key/value pair");
00220       iter++;
00221       continue;
00222     }
00223 
00224     if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_INSERT) {
00225 
00226       if (delete_present) {
00227         if (deleted_cell.fill() > 0) {
00228           len = (key_comps.column_qualifier - key_comps.row) + strlen(key_comps.column_qualifier) + 1;
00229           if (deleted_cell.fill() == len && !memcmp(deleted_cell.base, key_comps.row, len)) {
00230             if (key_comps.timestamp > deleted_cell_timestamp) {
00231               child_ptr->m_cell_map.insert(CellMap::value_type((*iter).first, (*iter).second));
00232               (*iter).second |= ALLOC_BIT_MASK;  // mark this entry in the "old" map so it doesn't get deleted
00233             }
00234             iter++;
00235             continue;
00236           }
00237           deleted_cell.clear();
00238         }
00239         if (deleted_column_family.fill() > 0) {
00240           len = key_comps.column_qualifier - key_comps.row;
00241           if (deleted_column_family.fill() == len && !memcmp(deleted_column_family.base, key_comps.row, len)) {
00242             if (key_comps.timestamp > deleted_column_family_timestamp) {
00243               child_ptr->m_cell_map.insert(CellMap::value_type((*iter).first, (*iter).second));
00244               (*iter).second |= ALLOC_BIT_MASK;  // mark this entry in the "old" map so it doesn't get deleted
00245             }
00246             iter++;
00247             continue;
00248           }
00249           deleted_column_family.clear();
00250         }
00251         if (deleted_row.fill() > 0) {
00252           len = strlen(key_comps.row) + 1;
00253           if (deleted_row.fill() == len && !memcmp(deleted_row.base, key_comps.row, len)) {
00254             if (key_comps.timestamp > deleted_row_timestamp) {
00255               child_ptr->m_cell_map.insert(CellMap::value_type((*iter).first, (*iter).second));
00256               (*iter).second |= ALLOC_BIT_MASK;  // mark this entry in the "old" map so it doesn't get deleted
00257             }
00258             iter++;
00259             continue;
00260           }
00261           deleted_row.clear();
00262         }
00263         delete_present = false;
00264       }
00265       child_ptr->m_cell_map.insert(CellMap::value_type((*iter).first, (*iter).second));
00266       (*iter).second |= ALLOC_BIT_MASK;  // mark this entry in the "old" map so it doesn't get deleted
00267       iter++;
00268     }
00269     else {
00270       if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00271         len = strlen(key_comps.row) + 1;
00272         if (delete_present && deleted_row.fill() == len && !memcmp(deleted_row.base, key_comps.row, len)) {
00273           if (deleted_row_timestamp < key_comps.timestamp)
00274             deleted_row_timestamp = key_comps.timestamp;
00275         }
00276         else {
00277           deleted_row.set(key_comps.row, len);
00278           deleted_row_timestamp = key_comps.timestamp;
00279           delete_present = true;
00280         }
00281       }
00282       else if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY) {
00283         len = key_comps.column_qualifier - key_comps.row;
00284         if (delete_present && deleted_column_family.fill() == len && !memcmp(deleted_column_family.base, key_comps.row, len)) {
00285           if (deleted_column_family_timestamp < key_comps.timestamp)
00286             deleted_column_family_timestamp = key_comps.timestamp;
00287         }
00288         else {
00289           deleted_column_family.set(key_comps.row, len);
00290           deleted_column_family_timestamp = key_comps.timestamp;
00291           delete_present = true;
00292         }
00293       }
00294       else if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL) {
00295         len = (key_comps.column_qualifier - key_comps.row) + strlen(key_comps.column_qualifier) + 1;
00296         if (delete_present && deleted_cell.fill() == len && !memcmp(deleted_cell.base, key_comps.row, len)) {
00297           if (deleted_cell_timestamp < key_comps.timestamp)
00298             deleted_cell_timestamp = key_comps.timestamp;
00299         }
00300         else {
00301           deleted_cell.set(key_comps.row, len);
00302           deleted_cell_timestamp = key_comps.timestamp;
00303           delete_present = true;
00304         }
00305       }
00306       iter++;
00307     }
00308   }
00309 
00310   Global::memory_tracker.add_items(child_ptr->m_cell_map.size());
00311 
00312   m_children.push_back(child_ptr);
00313 
00314   return child_ptr.get();
00315 }
